name: Ghost Kid (Kimskit)
description: Ghost kid is a child who has been too young to go out trick or treating alone on halloween but this year his moms finally let him go on his own! He gets slightly lost and wanders into a forest where he finds a portal… Which Ghost kid obviously enters since he is a young child with no concept of consequences! It teleports him to a darker dimension of his hometown where it's always nighttime and cold. He meets other kids “dressed up” as monsters. (they aren't kids tho, they are actual monsters but since they both look the same they don't really care or notice anything) Ghost kid needs to find his way home again before his Moms get too worried.
